metadata.synopsis: Players will approach a dead body.  A simple Medicine check DC 5 will inform the player that the corpse is still warm, thereby his death was very recent.A failed attempt will cause a more general statement about how very dead the body looks.
metadata.how_to_trigger: Walk near the dead body in Smuggler's Cave.

0.speaker: Player
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Played when Medicine check succeeds.

1.speaker: Player
1.text: Gods, what happened to his head?
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Played when Medicine check fails.
